page.title: 20Knebworths Missing Amenities
page.content:
Knebworth is a very nice village but I would like to see some more amenities.
I would like to have a cinema, but as there wouldn't be many people to use it, especially as many people now have their own home videos, I suppose this is unlikely.
I would also like to see a swimming pool, preferably indoor, but as there is a big pool in Stevenage I doubt if this would be possible either. There is a pool in the Junior School, but this is rather small and can only occasionally be used. It is also quite cold as it is outdoor.
We may one day get a BMX cycle track as there are areas of waste ground which could easily be used for this.
